text: The 1978 Vuelta a España was the 33rd edition of the Vuelta a España, one of cycling's Grand Tours. The Vuelta began in Gijón, with a prologue individual time trial on 25 April, and Stage 10 occurred on 5 May with a stage to Calafell. The race finished in San Sebastián on 14 May. ==Prologue== 25 April 1978 — Gijón to Gijón, (ITT) {| |Prologue result and general classification after Prologue {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank !
